content:
/>
V.ii.3.D.3.b
.
Approving Extra-Schedular Evaluations in Compensation Claims
Only the Director of the Compensation Service (214D) may approve extra-schedular evaluations in compensation claims submitted under
38 CFR 3.321(b)(1)
and
38 CFR 4.16(b)
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D - Evaluating Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D
